document_data.name: The Crying Witch
document_data.mainbody: '''The Crying Witch''' was a tavern that stood on [[Suzail]]'s [[the Market (Suzail)|Market]], a large open-air plaza on [[Garth Street]].
document_data.Location: The tavern stood on the Market's northern end where Garth Street met the plaza, across the street from the [[Hardshutters House]]. it was one of the closest drinking establishments to Suzail's western [[Field-Gates]].
document_data.History: The Crying Witch was established sometime before the {{YearlinkName|1356}}.
